title: Legendary Whitetails Men's Navigator Fleece Button Up Shirt
description: [Quality of Material]: Heavyweight fleece long sleeve shirt; made with 100% Polyester Fleece - 7.37 oz; combines the rugged look of a plaid flannel with the warmth and comfort of a light jacket
[Authentic Design]: Corduroy collar accents add style, while button-down chest pockets, complete with a pencil slot, offer practical functionality for this long sleeve button up shirt
[Branding]: Finished with the Legendary brand label and Signature Buck Logo patch on the lower placket on the bottom of the heavyweight fleece shirt

[Fit & Sizing]: This ultra-soft fleece button front shirt is built for durability and comfort, making it the perfect work-ready layer; this heavyweight regular fit fleece offers a comfortable and stylish fit for all body types

[Corduroy Lined Collar]: Experience the classic touch of quintessential corduroy lining in our flannel shirt for men; not only does it enhance durability, but it also ensures the collar maintains shape

A shirt like no other! The look of a rugged plaid flannel with the warmth and comfort of heavyweight fleece. Features corduroy collar accents, button down chest pockets (with pencil slot) and Legendary label finished with Signature Buck lower placket patch. Big & Tall sizes are designed for men over 6'2" and add 2" in body length and 1-1⁄2" in sleeve length.
